msmygit-dse-titbits.name: How to use Ansible with Astra
msmygit-dse-titbits.description: Titbits working with DataStax suite of products & Apache Cassandra(TM)

datastaxdevs-workshop-cassandra-fundamen.name: Apache Cassandra Fundamentals
datastaxdevs-workshop-cassandra-fundamen.description: Welcome to the Apache Cassandra™ Fundamentals workshop! In this two-hour workshop, we shows the most important fundamentals and basics of the powerful distributed NoSQL database Apache Cassandra™.

datastaxdevs-workshop-cassandra-data-mod.description: This session looks at how to effectively design a data model for your application. You’ll leave knowing how to create data models that scale effectively as your system grows
datastaxdevs-workshop-cassandra-data-mod.name: Apache Cassandra Data Modeling

datastaxdevs-workshop-cassandra-applicat.name: Apache Cassandra Application Development
datastaxdevs-workshop-cassandra-applicat.description: Learn about drivers, connectivity and requests by running a simple API with Apache Cassandra/Astra DB as its data backend.

datastaxdevs-bootcamp-fullstack-apps-wit.name: Build Microservice and API
datastaxdevs-bootcamp-fullstack-apps-wit.description: Learn how to build a backend for Cassandra, from data model to drivers to API exposition

datastaxdevs-workshop-storage-attached-i.description: Welcome to the 'Scalable Indexing for Cassandra using DataStax Astra' workshop! In this two-hour workshop, the Developer Advocate team of DataStax will explain the new Storage Attached Indexing (SAI) feature using Astra, the cloud based Cassandra-as-a-Service platform delivered by DataStax, to demonstrate how you can use them to add some much wanted flexibility to your Cassandra data model by querying outside of primary key fields.
datastaxdevs-workshop-storage-attached-i.name: Scalable Indexing for Cassandra using DataStax Astra

datastaxdevs-workshop-introduction-to-ma.name: Introduction to Machine Learning with Apache Spark and Apache Cassandra
datastaxdevs-workshop-introduction-to-ma.description: Come ready to discover the goals and approaches of machine learning, and how to build effective algorithms and solutions!

datastaxdevs-workshop-nosqlbench.name: Benchmark your Astra DB with NoSQLBench
datastaxdevs-workshop-nosqlbench.description: The goal of this workshop is to get you familiar with the powerful and versatile tool NoSQLBench. With that, you can perform industry-grade, robust benchmarks aimed at several (distributed) target systems, especially NoSQL databases.

datastaxdevs-workshop-k8ssandra.description: learn how to deploy and manage a data tier based on Apache Cassandra™ cluster in Kubernetes using K8ssandra.
datastaxdevs-workshop-k8ssandra.name: Deploy Cassandra into Kubernetes with K8ssandra

datastaxdevs-workshop-your-k8s-to-cloud.name: Cassandra in the cloud
datastaxdevs-workshop-your-k8s-to-cloud.description: Taking your K8s App to the cloud Online Workshop

datastaxdevs-appdev-week1-todolist.description: This is an example React To-Do application using a DataStax Astra free tier database.
datastaxdevs-appdev-week1-todolist.name: ToDo App using JAMStack, Netlify, and AstraDB

datastaxdevs-workshop-social-media-tikto.description: A simple Tik-Tok clone running on AstraDB that leverages the Document API.
datastaxdevs-workshop-social-media-tikto.name: TikTok clone using React, JAMStack and AstraDB

datastaxdevs-workshop-graphql-netflix.description: A simple ReactJS Netflix homepage clone running on Astra DB that leverages the GraphQL API with paging and infinite scrolling. This application is the result of the collaboration between Ania Kubow and the Datastax Developer Advocate team.
datastaxdevs-workshop-graphql-netflix.name: GraphQL Netflix Workshop

datastaxdevs-workshop-todo-native-mobile.name: React Native
datastaxdevs-workshop-todo-native-mobile.description: Adaptation of ToDo List Web App created for a DataStax workshop

datastaxdevs-workshop-intro-to-graphql.name: Introduction to GraphQL
datastaxdevs-workshop-intro-to-graphql.description: Learn the basics of GraphQL. Plenty of hands-on experience covering: a React client interacting with Astra DB using the Netlify stack; usage of playgrounds and tooling; running your own Java GraphQL backend based on the Netflix DGS framework.

datastaxdevs-workshop-spring-data-cassan.name: Todo Application (Spring Data)
datastaxdevs-workshop-spring-data-cassan.description: Build a Todolist with Spring Data Cassandra

datastaxdevs-workshop-ecommerce-app.name: eCommerce Application
datastaxdevs-workshop-ecommerce-app.description: Are you building or do you support an e-commerce website? If so, then this content is for you!  Worldwide digital sales in 2020 eclipsed four trillion dollars (USD). Businesses that want to compete, need a high performing e-commerce website. Here, we will demonstrate how to build a high performing persistence layer with DataStax ASTRA DB.

datastaxdevs-workshop-spring-stargate.name: Stargate Wheel App (Spring Data)
datastaxdevs-workshop-spring-stargate.description: Building Spring Boot/data Application leveraging Cassandra and Stargate

datastaxdevs-workshop-spring-reactive.name: PetClinic App (Spring, Reactive)
datastaxdevs-workshop-spring-reactive.description: Workshop Java Spring Reactive 🐈 PetClinic Application 🐕

datastaxdevs-workshop-ai-as-api.name: AI as an API
datastaxdevs-workshop-ai-as-api.description: Learn to build your own NLP text classifier and expose it as an API:

datastaxdevs-workshop-streaming-game.name: Drapetisca: a multiplayer online game with Astra Streaming and Websockets
datastaxdevs-workshop-streaming-game.description: A simple multiplayer online game (with in-game chat) featuring: Astra Streaming, Astra DB, WebSockets, React for the front-end and FastAPI for the back-end. Also spiders!

datastaxdevs-workshop-betterreads.name: Better Reads (Spring)
datastaxdevs-workshop-betterreads.description: Clone of Good Reads using Spring and Cassandra

datastaxdevs-workshop-intro-streaming-an.name: Introduction to Streaming and CDC
datastaxdevs-workshop-intro-streaming-an.description: We will visit the basics of change data capture (CDC) and why it's become so popular recently - with CDC, developers create smarter applications when real-time data is connected to the whole data ecosystem. During the workshop we will highlight use cases that make it your go-to solution when modernizing applications, getting more value out of your data (real-time), and joining new machine learning techniques with old applications.  We will introduce you to Apache Pulsar, show you how to enable the CDC feature in Datastax Astra, how to set up Astra Streaming, and (of course) how to get it all working together!

datastaxdevs-workshop-realtime-data-pipe.name: Real-Time data pipelines with Pulsar and Cassandra
datastaxdevs-workshop-realtime-data-pipe.description: You will inspect and run a sample architecture making use of Apache Pulsar™ and Pulsar Functions for real-time, event-streaming-based data ingestion, cleaning and processing.

datastaxdevs-workshop-IOS-Swift-Astra.name: Swift, IOS and Document API
datastaxdevs-workshop-IOS-Swift-Astra.description: Sample IOS app in Swift that connects to Datastax Astra

datastaxdevs-workshop-streaming-graph-qu.name: Quine and Astra DBIn progress 10/19
datastaxdevs-workshop-streaming-graph-qu.description: Workshop with Quine Partner showing power of Astra with Graph Analytics Quine.io

datastaxdevs-workshop-spring-quarkus-mic.name: Quarkus Spring and Micronaut
datastaxdevs-workshop-spring-quarkus-mic.description: Support Material for workshops going over the 3 frameworks
